'''1.3.10''' is a minor update to the [[launcher]] released on February 13, 2014.

== Changes ==
* Libraries use SHA-1 for validation

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.3.10|project=MCL
|1291|Spamming the log from the client freezes the launcher
|1516|Launcher shows "Ready to update & play Minecraft" or "Ready to download" even if no update is pending
|2176|'Minecraft' is miswritten in the Edit Profile dialog.
}}
